title: 20th-Century French-Inspired Stay in the Heart of Madrid with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Relax in European elegance at H10 Villa de la Reina, a stylish hotel in a majestic early 20th-century building on Madrid's iconic avenue, Gran Vía. Ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor, this French-inspired hotel enjoys a prime position a short walk from the Plaza Mayor and Retiro Park, surrounded by upscale boutiques, cafés, bars and restaurants.

From its location on the Spanish Broadway, there is an array of attractions on the doorstep, including Museo Nacional del Prado and the buzzing squares of Plaza de la Armería and Puerta del Sol. After a day of sightseeing, return to your boutique haven, or enjoy tapas and a signature cocktail at the stylish lobby bar La Villa.
offer_address: C/ Gran Via, 22, 28013 Madrid, Spain

title: 20th-Century French-Inspired Stay in the Heart of Madrid with Daily Breakfast
description:
Located on Madrid's iconic avenue, Gran Vía, H10 Villa de la Reina is a stylish hotel in a majestic early 20th-century building, a short walk from the Plaza Mayor and Retiro Park. Ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor, you'll find yourself surrounded by upscale boutiques, cafés, bars, and restaurants in Spain's vibrant capital.

Perfectly positioned on the Spanish Broadway, there are an array of attractions on your doorstep, including Museo Nacional del Prado and the buzzing squares of Plaza de la Armería and Puerta del Sol. After a day of sightseeing, return to your boutique French-inspired haven, or enjoy tapas and a signature cocktail at the stylish lobby bar La Villa.
location_description: H10 Villa de la Reina DNU
offer_address: C/ Gran Via, 22, 28013 Madrid, Spain

title: Madrid Relais & Chateaux City Break with Daily Breakfast, Rooftop Terrace & Michelin-Starred Restaurant
description:
Blending belle-époque charm with urban sophistication, this hotel occupies a beautifully restored early 20th-century building in one of Madrid's most elegant districts. Designer Lorenzo Castillo has curated a warm atmosphere with lacquered wood, marble and handmade wallpaper, complemented by European antiques and artwork.

Unwind on the elegant rooftop terrace, where panoramic views of Madrid create the perfect backdrop for relaxation or a memorable meal under the stars. Dining is elevated at the two Michelin-starred Haroma Restaurant, where chef Mario Sandoval crafts an eclectic menu using the finest ingredients to deliver a sophisticated culinary experience.

Set in the heart of Madrid's Salamanca district, the hotel is just steps away from the designer boutiques of Calle Serrano. The world-class art of the Prado Museum is within walking distance, as is the breathtaking Retiro Park, a lush, sprawling oasis where you can explore tranquil lakes, grand monuments and hidden gardens.
offer_address: Calle de Diego de León 43, Madrid 28006, Spain

vendor_name: Hotel Montera Madrid - a Curio by Hilton
title: Grand Opening: Five-Star Madrid Glamour on Legendary Gran Via with Daily Breakfast & Rooftop Cocktails
description:
Be one of the first to experience the Spanish capital at your leisure from the perfect launchpad - the brand new Hotel Montera Madrid, a Curio Collection by Hilton. Energetic and enticing, Madrid captivates its visitors with its incredible art, culture and gastronomy - experience this vibrant city for yourself from this five-star beauty that provides unparalleled views over the glorious CBD from its rooftop pool deck. Catch glimpses of Gran Via grandeur and the sparkling city lights while lazing poolside on a comfortable lounge with your drink of choice from the Skybar.

Relax in European elegance surrounded by the majesty of Madrid's most iconic avenue. With its 19th-century boulevards lined with fine-dining restaurants and designer boutiques, most notably along the Golden Mile shopping strip, as well as boasting verdant gardens and captivating nightlife, the best of the city is on your doorstep. For art aficionados, find the 'Golden Triangle' of world-class museums a short walk from your hotel.
location_description: Hotel Montera Madrid - a Curio by Hilton
offer_address: Calle Montera 47, Madrid 28013, Spain

title: 20th-Century French-Inspired Stay in the Heart of Madrid with Daily Breakfast
description:
Relax in European elegance at H10 Villa de la Reina, a stylish hotel in a majestic early 20th-century building on Madrid's iconic avenue, Gran Vía. From its location on the Spanish Broadway, there is an array of attractions on the doorstep, including Museo Nacional del Prado and the buzzing squares of Plaza de la Armería and Puerta del Sol. title: Madrid Five-Star Heritage Elegance in the Heart of Salamanca with Daily Breakfast
description:
Energetic and enticing, Madrid captivates its visitors with its incredible art, culture and gastronomy - experience this vibrant city for yourself with a stay at the five-star Wellington Hotel & Spa Madrid. This luxurious heritage hotel has proudly stood as part of Madrid’s cityscape since 1952 and hasn’t lost the glamour of its former years. Be wined and dined at three exquisite onsite restaurants, enjoy a tipple at the sun-soaked terrace bar and share a pint at the English-style pub. There’s even an onsite bakery, where you can pick up freshly baked bread and treats. Be pampered at SPA at Le Max Wellness Club Wellington, which features tranquil treatment rooms, a hydrotherapy pool, Finnish sauna and hammam.

Madrid’s Salamanca district is the city’s most exclusive area and home to the 'Golden Triangle' of world-class museums. Its 19th-century boulevards are lined with fine-dining restaurants and designer boutiques, most notably along the Golden Mile shopping strip, as well as boasting verdant gardens and captivating nightlife.
offer_address: Calle de Velazquez 8, Madrid 28001, Spain

title: Modern Madrid City Break near Retiro Park with Daily Breakfast & Welcome Wine
description:
Discover the regal heritage of Spain's capital from this modern hotel, located just a stone's throw from the iconic Retiro Park and the city's trendy neighbourhoods. Be perfectly positioned to stroll 118 hectares of Madrid's historic parklands, passing monuments erected in the 17th century and savouring vistas once privately owned by the Spanish monarchy.

At your base, share pintxos at the hotel's Garden Restaurant or sit back with a fruity Spanish vino at the Lounge Bar, before taking on the lively Lavapiés district, boasting an active nightlife and leisure scene that booms seven days a week. The unmissable Royal Palace, Puerta del Sol, and El Rastro market are also nearby.
location_description: voco Madrid Retiro, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Calle Pez Volador, 11, Retiro, Madrid 28007, Spain

title: A stylish hotel in the heart of Madrid
description: Discover the tapas restaurants, boutique shopping and beautiful architecture of Spain's most fashionable city staying at the Radisson Blu Madrid. Includes a daily breakfast, welcome glass of red wine and access to the hotel's spa which features an indoor pool and gym.
offer_address: Calle Moratín, Plaza Platería de Martínez, 53, 28014 Madrid, Spain

title: Stylish Stay in the Heart of Madrid with Rooftop Plunge Pool
description:
Located within Madrid's charming Salamanca neighbourhood, H10 Puerta de Alcalá is a stylish hotel just minutes from the city's famed Retiro Park. Enjoy a break in total sophistication and comfort in this contemporary hotel, close to the upscale boutiques, cafés, bars and restaurants of Spain's vibrant capital. Within 30 minutes' walk, you can reach top attractions including the Museo Nacional del Prado and the buzzing squares of Plaza Mayor and Puerta del Sol.

Indulge in a higher level of luxury with a rooftop plunge pool, onsite restaurant and stylish lobby bar serving tapas and signature cocktails. Sit down for a drink at the hotel's rooftop bar, El Cielo de Alcalá, one of the best spots in the city to catch breathtaking panoramic views of the city skyline.
offer_address: Calle de Alcalá, 66, 28009 Madrid, Spain

title: Five-Star Madrid Luxurious City Break with Daily Breakfast & Rooftop Bar
description: Oozing with old-world charm and with an appreciation for art at its core, Villa Real Hotel boasts five-star luxury in the iconic Plaza de las Cortes. Boasting a prime position in the art triangle of Madrid, the boutique hotel invites guests to relax on plush furnishings surrounded by curated artworks. Relish scrumptious Mediterranean-inspired dishes in New York-inspired interiors, or sip a refreshing drink poolside, all while taking in the stunning cityscape from the hotel's airy rooftop.
offer_address: Pl. de las Cortes, 10, 28014 Madrid, Spain

title: Madrid Modernist City Break near Retiro Park with Garden Restaurant
description: Discover Spain's vibrant capital from this modernist hotel, located just a stone's throw from iconic Retiro Park and the city's trendy neighbourhoods. Take a moment to savour traditional cuisine at the hotel's Garden Restaurant, or sit back with tapas and a cocktail at the Lounge Bar before exploring the city's rich history and contemporary art scene. With the finest shopping, dining, and entertainment venues at your fingertips, a memorable Spanish escape awaits.
location_description: voco Madrid Retiro, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Calle Pez Volador 11, Retiro, Madrid 28007, Spain

title: Five-Star Madrid Luxury with Globally Renowned Concept Restaurant, Spa Zone and Rooftop Pool
description: Luxury awaits at the timeless BLESS Hotel Madrid, a five-star retreat located along the Golden Mile of the Spanish capital city’s exclusive Salamanca neighbourhood. While the neighbouring streets offer plenty in ways of fine dining, there's no need to travel far for an exquisite meal of culinary excellence at the world-class, onsite SLVJ restaurant. After, enjoy the most deluxe treatments at the hotel's Spa Zone or visit the Picos Pardos Sky Lounge and rooftop pool.
offer_address: Calle de Velázquez, 62, 28001, Madrid, Spain

title: Madrid Five-Star Heritage Elegance in the Heart of Salamanca
description:
Energetic and enticing, Madrid captivates its visitors with its incredible art, culture and gastronomy. Experience this vibrant city for yourself with a stay at the five-star Wellington Hotel & Spa. The luxurious heritage hotel has proudly stood as part of Madrid’s cityscape since 1952 and hasn’t lost the glamour of its former years. Be wined and dined at three exquisite onsite restaurants, enjoy a tipple at the sun-soaked terrace bar and share a pint at the English-style pub. There’s even an onsite bakery, where you can pick up freshly baked bread and treats. Be pampered at SPA at Le Max Wellness Club Wellington, which features tranquil treatment rooms, a 30ºC hydrotherapy pool, Finnish sauna and hammam.

Madrid’s Salamanca district is the city’s most exclusive area, home to 19th-century boulevards lined with fine-dining restaurants and designer boutiques, most notably along the Golden Mile. Madrid’s celebrated parks, including El Retiro Park, are just outside your door. Meanwhile, culture enthusiasts will relish the location in the heart of the city’s Golden Triangle of Art: spend a day perusing Museo Nacional del Prado, Museo Nacional Thyssen-Bornemisza and Museo Nacional Centro de Arte Reina Sofía.
offer_address: C. de Velázquez, 8, 28001 Madrid, Spain

title: Five-Star Madrid Elegant Glamour on Legendary Gran Via
description: Stay in the heart of the action at The Principal Madrid, which boasts an unbeatable location along the ever-exciting Gran Via, an iconic nightlife and dining street. Dine at renowned chef Ramón Freixa's Ático restaurant for tapas and exquisite meals, or on sunny afternoons, enjoy a sangria at the rooftop La Terraza, among the olive trees and cypresses. After wining and dining, head to the Wellbeing Area where a soothing spa offers pampering treatments.
offer_address: C. del Marqués de Valdeiglesias, 1, 28004 Madrid, Spain

title: Madrid Five-Star Boutique Elegance with Two Onsite Restaurants
description: Where palatial elegance meets modern luxury, experience the grandeur of Madrid from the heart of the city at URSO Hotel & Spa. Retaining many of its original 20th-century features including an ornate facade and stained glass observatory - now light-filled restaurant - be embraced by classic Spanish refinement. Treat yourself at the tranquil URSO Spa complete with a hydrotherapy pool, or savour innovative cuisine at Casa Felisa restaurant.
offer_address: Mejía Lequerica 8, Madrid 28004, Spain

title: Madrid Designer Escape in the Heart of Plaza de Isabel II with Rooftop Pool & Bar
description:
Enjoy an unbeatable location in the heart of the city when you stay at Ocean Drive Madrid. Part of OD Hotels' contemporary Mediterranean brand - which includes designer properties in Ibiza, Mallorca and Barcelona - the hotel boasts an innovative and elegant vibe, perfectly paired with charming modern furnishings and designer décor. Ascend to Sky Bar to drink in breathtaking 360-degree panoramic views from the rooftop pool, indulge in global fare at the restaurant, or sunbathe on the spacious garden terrace. 

Located in a prime position in front of the Opera Palace, this is the perfect launchpad for exploring Plaza de Isabel II and beyond, with the Royal Palace, Plaza Mayor, Puerta del Sol and Gran Vía all within walking distance. Emblematic neighbourhoods La Latina, Huertas, Los Austrias, Malasaña and Chueca are all also nearby. With the best of Madrid on your doorstep, you’ll truly be spoilt for choice
offer_address: Pl. de Isabel II, 7, 28013 Madrid, Spain

title: Heritage Spanish Art-Deco Luxury in the Heart of Madrid
description: Step back in time to the luxurious grandeur of days past with a five-star stay at Gran Hotel Ingles - a distinguished gem nestled in the heart of Madrid. As the city's oldest luxury hotel, it exudes an authentic charm, blending palatial opulence with contemporary sophistication. Step outside to explore Madrid's vibrant cultural scene, from the nearby Prado Museum to the bustling Mercado de San Miguel, before retreating to LobByto for a glamorous cocktail or aperitif to end any evening.
offer_address: Calle de Echegaray, 8, 28014 Madrid, Spain

title: Five-Star Madrid Palace Glamour in the Heart of the Golden Triangle of Art
description: Art aficionados and fans of Spanish culture can't pass up a five-star stay at Mandarin Oriental Ritz, Madrid, a luxury Belle Époque palace located in the famous Golden Triangle of Art of Madrid. Unbeatable facilities include five restaurants and bars overseen by Spain's celebrated Chef Quique Dacosta - including the luxurious Palm Court and sparkling Champagne Bar - an opulent indoor swimming pool fit for royalty, plus an onsite spa featuring a vitality pool, experience showers and a steam room.
offer_address: Plaza de la Lealtad 5, 28014 Madrid, Spain

title: 19th-Century Five-Star Boutique Madrid Escape
description: Experience true Spanish cosmopolitan elegance with a stay at Hotel Hospes Puerta De Alcala - a 19th-century architectural masterpiece, designed by José María de Aguilar. This delightful retreat is located in the heart of the city, with awe-inspiring cultural and historic monuments only minutes from the hotel. Stroll through the streets to discover an abundance of flavours, enrich your mind with a trip to the Reina Sofia Museum, and indulge in high-end retail therapy along the world-class Salamanca.
offer_address: Plaza de la Independencia 3, Madrid 28001, Spain

title: Stylish Spain Escape in the Heart of Madrid
description: Immerse yourself in the electric buzz of Spain's elegant capital from the stylish Hotel Indigo Madrid - Princesa, an IHG Hotel, a modern oasis set within the tranquil neighbourhood of Moncloa-Argüelles. Savour avant-garde dishes at Best Restaurant and keep up with your routine at the onsite fitness centre. When it's time to explore, you'll find yourself just a stone's throw from inspiring sights, including the imposing Torre de Madrid, Plaza de Espana and the sophisticated Royal Palace.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Madrid - Princesa, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Calle Marques de Urquijo 4, Madrid 28008 Spain

title: Sophisticated Madrid Escape with Rooftop Infinity Pool & City Views
description: Discover Mediterranean bliss with a relaxing stay at Hotel Indigo Madrid - Gran Via, an IHG Hotel, located in the heart of the city, mere moments away from exquisite Spanish monuments. Live as the locals do by exploring the street art and museums, wandering through abundantly green parks and dancing the nights away. Retreat to this beautiful hotel to soak in views of the sun setting from the rooftop infinity pool before enjoying an authentic bite to eat at El Gato Canalla.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Madrid - Gran Via, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Calle Silva 6, Madrid 28013, Spain

title: Five-Star Relais & Châteaux Opulence in the Heart of Madrid
description: Experience an effortless collision of Spanish elegance and contemporary luxe at the five-star Hotel Orfila, a Relais & Châteaux hotel in the heart of Madrid, moments from top cultural attractions. Housed in a 19th-century palace, this boutique abode features just 32 rooms and suites. It sets the stage for an exceptional restaurant, El Jardín de Orfila, where the philosophy of showcasing fresh, local ingredients through avant-garde techniques has been executed by Mario Sandoval, who has worked in acclaimed, Michelin-starred restaurants. This opulent realm invites you to unwind in style after days exploring the city: take a stroll through Madrid's cobbled streets, hop between tapas restaurants, or wander the art-lined walkways of the Prado Museum.
offer_address: C. de Orfila, 6, 28010 Madrid, Spain

title: Madrid Award-Winning Five-Star Heritage Glamour with Daily Breakfast
description:
Join the jet-set elite in Madrid’s glamorous Salamanca quarter at the Relais & Chateaux Heritage Madrid Hotel - currently ranked within the top 10 hotels in all of Spain on Tripadvisor and previously featured in Condé Nast Traveler’s prestigious Gold List.

Serious luxury is par for the course at this five-star heritage retreat, where you can relax in one of 46 exquisite rooms and suites, sip champagne and eat oysters on the secret roof terrace, then slip out into Salamanca's sprinkling of fine restaurants, tapas bars, designer boutiques, the iconic Prado Museum and vibrant Plaza Mayor. The opulence goes beyond the early 20th-century façade and further than the grandiose interiors by designer Lorenzo Castillo - there's also the world-class Restaurante Haroma, overseen by two Michelin-starred chef Mario Sandoval, hidden within.

**Your handpicked inclusions (select nights/packages only)**

- Refuel for a day of discovery with **daily breakfast** at the top-rated Restaurante Haroma
- Be welcomed in true style with a **complimentary drink** on arrival
- Enjoy an **upgrade to a Superior Room**, subject to availability (Classic Double Rooms only, 4+ nights)

**Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice, Best of the Best 2020** Top Hotels - Spain

**Travelling with family?** Upgrade to the Family Room for two adults and up to two children (11 and under) or the Deluxe Family Room for three adults and up to two children (11 and under).
offer_address: Calle de Diego de León, 43, 28006 Madrid Madrid Spain

title: Five-Star Avant-Garde Luxury in the Heart of Madrid with Michelin-Star Restaurant
description:
Experience Madrid in the height of style and luxury with a stay at the five-star Hotel Urban. The hotel exudes big-city glamour, from its onsite Michelin-starred Cebo Restaurant to the unique avant-garde artwork and sultry glass-roof bar. Stamped with a Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice 2021 award, Hotel Urban offers the highest quality facilities and warm hospitality in the heart of Spain's capital. Order tapas at the panoramic Urban Terrace, take a dip in the rooftop swimming pool and get your cocktail fix at the fashionable Glass Bar.

The hotel is located near Madrid’s Museum Triangle, meaning art and history aficionados are within easy reach of the city’s best cultural attractions, including Museo Nacional del Prado, Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum and Museo Nacional Centro de Arte Reina Sofía. Plus, the Royal Palace of Madrid and other iconic sites are within a 20-minute walk.
offer_address: Carrera de S. Jeronimo, 34, 28014 Madrid, Spain

title: Modern Madrid Stay Close to Transport & Airport
description: Minutes from the airport, Crowne Plaza Madrid Airport, an IHG Hotel is a gateway to Spain's cosmopolitan capital. Work up an appetite at the fitness centre before savouring international dishes at the Siesta Bar restaurant. Sophisticated and spacious guestrooms await to refresh and revitalise you before you undertake an expedition to experience the marvellous metropolis of Madrid. Closely connected to public transport, this hotel makes it simple to explore the city in all its splendour.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Madrid Airport, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: C. de Lola Flores, 1, Madrid 28022, Spain

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Express Madrid-San Sebastian D/L Reyes
title: Spanish Escape 30 Minutes from the Heart of Madrid
description: Wander through the charming streets of Madrid, dine on spectacular paella and immerse yourself in the Spanish culture with a stay at Holiday Inn Express Madrid-San Sebastian de los Reyes, an IHG Hotel. Located 30 minutes from the city centre, this is the ideal retreat for those seeking exploration and relaxation within one vacation. Learn the fascinating history of the city as you take your time soaking in fashion boutiques, architecture and theatres hosting gorgeous flamenco shows.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Madrid-San Sebastian d/l Reyes, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Avenida De Los Pirineos S/N, Madrid 28700, Spain

title: Five-Star Madrid Escape on Paseo de la Castellana near Iconic Sorolla Museum
description: Step into the marble-lined lobby of the InterContinental Madrid, an IHG Hotel, to discover a luxurious retreat amid the bustling streets of Spain's vibrant capital. Take a moment to indulge in sumptuous fine dining served on a verdant garden terrace before discovering the city’s longest avenue right on your doorstep. Stroll down the vibrant Paseo de la Castellana, lined with mouth-watering dining options, marvel at iconic artwork in countless museums or wander around the nearby shopping districts.
offer_address: Paseo De La Castellana 49, Madrid, 28046, Spain
